A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I love Star Wars so this is given some benefit of the doubt.   During the movie\, I was generally enthralled\, but there were definitely plot holes.   By the time I left the movie\, I was more dismayed at the terrible plot holes\, lack of continuity\, etc. and simply can't 'square it' to make sense.    Some dramatic changes must be made before the next movie.    I'm not too sure about the Solo movie since it shares a taint from the same studios.
